swords_proficiency.name: Swords Proficiency
swords_proficiency.description: Skill with all bladed weapons: long, short, scimitar, broad, 2H, bastard, falchion, katana, ninja-to, and wakizashi.

polearms_proficiency.name: Polearms Proficiency
polearms_proficiency.description: Skill with long reach weapons: halberds, pikes, awls, lances, spears, staves, and mauls.

axes_proficiency.name: Axes Proficiency
axes_proficiency.description: Skill with all axe types: battle axes, thrown axes, war axes, 2H axes, and hand axes.

mace_flail_proficiency.name: Mace & Flail Proficiency
mace_flail_proficiency.description: Skill with blunt force weapons: maces, flails, war hammers, whips, and morning stars.

unarmed_combat.name: Unarmed Combat
unarmed_combat.description: Skill in hand-to-hand fighting, kicks, and general martial arts techniques (Monk prerequisite).

daggers_proficiency.name: Daggers Proficiency
daggers_proficiency.description: Skill with all small, finesse weapons: knives, daggers, and darts.

bows_proficiency.name: Bows Proficiency
bows_proficiency.description: Skill with long, short, and composite bows.

crossbows_proficiency.name: Crossbows Proficiency
crossbows_proficiency.description: Skill with light and heavy crossbows.

slings_proficiency.name: Slings Proficiency
slings_proficiency.description: Skill with slings and other projectile weapons.

wands_proficiency.name: Wands Proficiency
wands_proficiency.description: Skill in effectively wielding and maximizing the power of magical wands.

light_armor_proficiency.name: Light Armor Proficiency
light_armor_proficiency.description: Reduces penalties for wearing cloth, robes, and leather armor; required for high-DEX and casting classes.

medium_armor_proficiency.name: Medium Armor Proficiency
medium_armor_proficiency.description: Reduces movement penalty and increases base protection for wearing ring mail, brigandine, and scale.

heavy_armor_proficiency.name: Heavy Armor Proficiency
heavy_armor_proficiency.description: Reduces massive speed penalties and unlocks higher damage reduction bonuses for chain, splint, banded, and plate armor.

shield_mastery.name: Shield Mastery
shield_mastery.description: Reduces to-hit penalties for using bucklers, medium, large, and tower shields. Unlocks advanced shield maneuvers.
